price: Ni starehe ndogo, nao watapata adhabu chungu.
footnotes: Wakiendelea kufuata matamanio yao ya kidunia, basi hakika starehe yao hiyo ni chache na haina dawamu, na Akhera watapata adhabu kali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
